tasks.label: mesclar base/last-release com a branch atual

windows.command: if (git remote | findstr 'base') { git remote set-url base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/base-repo.git } else { git remote add base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/base-repo.git }; git fetch base; git merge base/latest-release

linux.command: git remote | grep base && git remote set-url base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/base-repo.git || git remote add base https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/base-repo.git; git fetch base && git merge base/latest-release
